title: Are humans the only self-aware entities? - Quora

response.answer_text: Since you use the term “entities” I have to respond that angels are also self-aware. Some claim that all higher animals are self-aware, but that opinion arises from misunderstanding what self-awareness means. Any attempt to engage in a conversation about abstract ideas, such as self-awareness, with any other creature on earth makes clear that the lower animals are not self-aware. They are aware of what they sense, but not self-aware because that requires a power of intellect they don’t possess.

In a Belgian study from 2015, 23 out of 24 adult ants scratched at small blue dots painted on their clypeus (part of their "face") when they were able to see the dot in a mirror. Mirror test - Wikipedia
